Function Documentation

pid_t fork ( )

This function is not supported.

Returns
Zero on success or -1 on error with errno (see Error Numbers) set to:
  • ENOTSUP: function is not supported
pid_t vfork ( )

This function is not supported.

Returns
Zero on success or -1 on error with errno (see Error Numbers) set to:
  • ENOTSUP: function is not supported
